snippet: Nigerian ground forces backed by warplanes battled Boko Haram militants on Tuesday in a second day of heavy fighting that wounded the son of former President Olusegun Obasanjo, a senior official said.
abstract: Nigerian ground forces backed by warplanes battle Boko Haram militants in and around Michika, Nigeria; Lt Col Adebayo Obasanjo, son of former Pres Olusegun Obasanjo, is wounded.
lead_paragraph: Nigerian ground forces backed by warplanes battled Boko Haram militants on Tuesday in a second day of heavy fighting that wounded the son of former President Olusegun Obasanjo, a senior official said.

headline.main: Nigeria: Ex-President’s Son Wounded in Tense Battle
headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Ex-President’s Son Wounded in Tense Battle
